title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 200.3 - Marketing order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 200.3 - Marketing order

State Regulations

Any producer or group of producers of a particular
agricultural commodity or commodities may petition the commissioner for an
order. The petition shall be in writing and shall set forth in concise terms
the particular marketing situation and economic condition thereof regarding
which it is alleged a marketing order is needed and such petition shall be
verified. The commissioner shall investigate the allegations of the petition
and if he is satisfied that the subject or condition alleged warrants a hearing
he shall call a hearing on the petition so filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
200.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
